translation.zh: 还要听史密斯唠叨他的政治观点

translation.en: Just step this way, sir.
translation.zh: 请这边来，先生

translation.en: I'm going to Stanbury in the morning. I'll give you a lift...
translation.zh:
我明天一早要去斯坦伯里
我可以捎你一程…

translation.en: ...and we could pick up a can of petrol on the way.
translation.zh: 在路上买点儿汽油

translation.en: -I'd hate to inconvenience you. -Not at all. Would 7:30 suit you?
translation.zh:
-我不想麻烦您
-不麻烦，七点半可以吗？

translation.en: You'll enjoy talking to Dr. Carlisle. Watch this step.
translation.zh:
你会很喜欢和卡尔兰医生聊天的
小心台阶

translation.en: Excuse Harry Smith.
translation.zh: 不要介意哈利·史密斯

translation.en: He will go on about his politics. I don't mean he's not right.
translation.zh:
一谈到政治，他就滔滔不绝
我不是说他说的不对

translation.en: Democracy is why we fought Hitler, and we lost a few lads in this village...
translation.zh:
民主正是我们对抗德国的动力
我们失去了很多…

translation.en: ...including our son here.
translation.zh: 包括我的儿子

translation.en: Dunkirk.
translation.zh: 敦刻尔克

translation.en: I'll get you a blanket.
translation.zh: 我给你拿一条毯子

translation.en: I've left a razor and soap on the basin.
translation.zh:
我在盥洗室放了一只刮胡刀
和一块香皂

translation.en: Thank you.
translation.zh: 谢谢你

translation.en: I was merely saying that you cannot go wrong if you...
translation.zh:
我的意思是
如果你听取大街上的人的意见…

translation.en: ...listen to the opinions of your man in the street.
translation.zh:
我的意思是
如果你听取大街上的人的意见… 你一定不会犯错的

translation.en: They're perfectly entitled to give an opinion...
translation.zh: 他们完全有资格提出建议…

translation.en: ...on politics or whatever questions--
translation.zh: 不管是政治还是其他的…

translation.en: They've got no qualifications!
translation.zh: 他们没有资格！

translation.en: Of course they have!
translation.zh: 他们当然有资格！

translation.en: Stevens.
translation.zh: 史蒂文斯

translation.en: Mr. Spencer would like a word with you.
translation.zh: 斯宾塞先生想和你聊两句

translation.en: My good man, I have a question for you.
translation.zh: 我的好先生，我有一个问题

translation.en: Yes, sir.
translation.zh: 请讲，先生

translation.en: Do you suppose the debt situation regarding America...
translation.zh: 你认为现在美国的债务问题…

translation.en: ...factors significantly in the present low levels of trade?
translation.zh: 是不是影响贸易不景气的主要原因？

translation.en: Or is this a red herring...
translation.zh: 还是说这是不相干的事…

translation.en: ...and the abandonment of the gold standard is the cause of the problem?
translation.zh: 而抛弃黄金标准才是问题的根源呢？

translation.en: I'm sorry, sir, but I am unable to be of assistance in this matter.
translation.zh: 对不起，先生，这事我帮不上忙

translation.en: Oh, dear. What a pity.
translation.zh: 哦，真遗憾

translation.en: Perhaps you'd help us on another matter.
translation.zh: 或许你帮我们其他的忙

translation.en: Oh, no.
translation.zh: 哦，不

translation.en: Do you think...
translation.zh: 你觉得…

translation.en: ...Europe's currency problem would be alleviated by an arms agreement...
translation.zh: 法国和布尔什维克之间的武器协定…

translation.en: ...between the French and the Bolsheviks?
translation.zh: 会不会缓解欧洲的货币问题？

translation.en: I'm sorry, sir, but I'm unable to be of assistance in this matter.
translation.zh: 对不起，先生，这事我也帮不上忙

translation.en: Very well, that'll be all.
translation.zh: 很好，没别的事了

translation.en: One moment, Darlington, I have another question to put to our good man here.
translation.zh:
稍等，达林顿
我还要问好管家一个问题

translation.en: My good fellow...
translation.zh: 我亲爱的朋友…

translation.en: ...do you share our opinion...
translation.zh: 你能否同意我们的观点…

translation.en: ...that M. Daladier's recent speech on North Africa...
translation.zh: 达拉迪尔最近在北美的演讲…

translation.en: ...was simply a ruse...
translation.zh: 只是个诡计…

translation.en: ...to scupper the nationalist fringe of his own domestic party?
translation.zh:
是为了给他自己党派的
极端民族主义派搞破坏？

translation.en: I'm sorry, sir. I am unable to help in any of these matters.
translation.zh: 我很抱歉，这诸多事我都帮不上忙

translation.en: You see, our good man here is "unable to assist us in these matters."
translation.zh:
正如你所见，我们的好管家
“诸多事都帮不上忙”

translation.en: Yet we still go along with the notion...
translation.zh: 但是我们还坚持认为…

translation.en: ...that this nation's decisions be left to our good man here...
translation.zh:
这个国家的重大决定
应该由像他这样的…

translation.en: ...and a few millions like him.
translation.zh: 几百万民众来决定

translation.en: You may as well ask the Mothers' Union to organize a war campaign.
translation.zh:
还不如叫母亲联合会
去安排战争策略呢

translation.en: Thank you, Stevens.
translation.zh: 多谢你了，史蒂文斯

translation.en: Thank you. Thank you, sir.
translation.zh: 谢谢你，先生，谢谢

translation.en: You certainly proved your point.
translation.zh: 你显然是证实了你的观点

translation.en: -Q.E.D., I think. -No, not at all!
translation.zh:
-“证明完毕”，我想
-不，才不是！

translation.en: Oh, yes, he has!
translation.zh: 哦，是的，他是！

translation.en: What did you make of the citizens of Moscombe? Not a bad bunch.
translation.zh:
你觉得莫思考比的人怎么样？
还不错吧

translation.en: No, sir.
translation.zh: 很好，先生

translation.en: Mr. and Mrs. Taylor were extremely kind.
translation.zh: 泰勒夫妇非常友善

translation.en: I say, I hope you don't think me very rude...
translation.zh: 我希望不会冒犯您…

translation.en: ...but you aren't a manservant of some sort, are you?
translation.zh: 你不是男仆之类的吧，是吗？

translation.en: Yes, sir. I am, indeed.
translation.zh: 是的，先生，我的确是

translation.en: In fact, I'm the butler of Darlington Hall, near Oxford.
translation.zh:
实际上我是牛津郡的
达林顿庄园的管家

translation.en: It wasn't my intention to deceive anyone.
translation.zh: 我没有想欺骗任何人

translation.en: Don't explain. I can see how it happened.
translation.zh:
不用解释了
我大概猜到了发生了什么

translation.en: Darlington.
translation.zh: 达林顿

translation.en: Wasn't there a Lord Darlington involved...
translation.zh:
是不是有一位达林顿勋爵
参与了…

translation.en: ...in that appeasement business that got us into the war?
translation.zh: 平息德国，使我们卷入战争的活动？

translation.en: Sorry, I never knew that Lord Darlington.
translation.zh: 对不起，我不认识那位达林顿勋爵

translation.en: My employer's an American gentleman, Mr. Lewis.
translation.zh: 我的主人是美国人路易斯先生

translation.en: Lord Darlington was among those who tried to make a deal with Hitler.
translation.zh:
达林顿勋爵是曾想
与希特勒谈判的一伙人之一

translation.en: Then there was a case after the war...
translation.zh: 战后有件案子…

translation.en: ...where he sued a newspaper for libel.
translation.zh: 是他起诉一家报纸诽谤他

translation.en: The Express, was it? News Chronicle?
translation.zh:
《快讯报》吗？
还是《新闻纪事》？

translation.en: -I couldn't say, sir. -Anyway, he lost.
translation.zh:
-我不知道，先生
-反正他败诉了

translation.en: He was lucky, really, not to have been tried for treason.
translation.zh:
他很幸运
没有因叛国罪而被审

translation.en: There it is, just ahead.
translation.zh: 就在那儿，在前面

translation.en: Sir, I must confess...
translation.zh: 先生，我要坦白…

translation.en: ...that I failed to tell you the truth.
translation.zh: 我没有告诉你实情

translation.en: I did know Lord Darlington, and I can declare that he was a truly good man.
translation.zh:
我的确认识达林顿勋爵
我认为他是一个好人

translation.en: A gentleman through and through...
translation.zh: 他是一个不折不扣的绅士…

translation.en: ...to whom I'm proud to have given my best years of service.
translation.zh: 为他效力了很多年，我很自豪

translation.en: That should get you to the next petrol station.
translation.zh: 这下你可以开到下一个加油站了

translation.en: Thank you very much, sir. I'm most grateful.
translation.zh:
非常感谢，先生
我很感激

translation.en: But did you...
translation.zh: 但是你…

translation.en: ...share his opinions?
translation.zh: 同意他的观点吗？

translation.en: Who?
translation.zh: 谁？

translation.en: Lord Darlington.
translation.zh: 达林顿勋爵

translation.en: I was his butler. I was there to serve him...
translation.zh: 我是他的管家，只负责服侍他…

translation.en: ...not to agree or disagree.
translation.zh: 不是去同意，还是不同意

translation.en: You trusted him.
translation.zh: 你信任他

translation.en: Yes, I did. Completely.
translation.zh: 是的，完全的信任

translation.en: But at the end of his life, he himself admitted that he'd been...mistaken.
translation.zh:
但是在他弥留之际
他确实承认…他错了

translation.en: That he'd been too gullible, and he'd let himself be taken in.
translation.zh: 他太轻信，让自己被蒙骗了

translation.en: I see.
translation.zh: 我明白了

translation.en: Yes.
translation.zh: 是的

translation.en: Thank you, sir. You've been most kind.
translation.zh: 谢谢你，先生，你是个好人

translation.en: Thank you.
translation.zh: 谢谢你

translation.en: Just keep going straight up here, and turn left at the first crossroads.
translation.zh:
一路开下去
在第一个十字路口左转

translation.en: I say, I don't want to be a bore, but I'm intrigued.
translation.zh:
我不想钻牛角尖
但是我很感兴趣

translation.en: Where do you stand on all that?
translation.zh: 你的立场是什么？

translation.en: If a mistake was to be made, wouldn't you rather have made your own?
translation.zh:
如果一定要犯错误
你难道不情愿亲自去犯错吗？

translation.en: Forgive me for being so inquisitive.
translation.zh: 请原谅我的好奇心

translation.en: Not at all, sir.
translation.zh: 没关系，先生

translation.en: In a very small way, I did make my own mistake.
translation.zh: 在某个小事上，我确实犯了错

translation.en: But I might have a chance to set mine right.
translation.zh: 但是我还有机会改正这个错误

translation.en: In fact, I'm on my way to try and do so now.
translation.zh:
实际上
我正在去改正错误的路上

translation.en: Yes.
translation.zh: 是的

translation.en: Try the ignition.
translation.zh: 试试引擎

translation.en: Thank you, sir. I'm most grateful for your help.
translation.zh:
谢谢你，先生
我非常感激你的帮助

translation.en: Good luck. It's been interesting talking to you.
translation.zh:
祝你好运
很高兴和你聊天

translation.en: Oh, Stevens.
translation.zh: 哦，史蒂文斯

translation.en: Good morning.
translation.zh: 早上好

translation.en: Lord Halifax was impressed with the silver.
translation.zh: 哈利法克斯勋爵赞美了那些银具

translation.en: I told him it was all your doing. Sent his compliments. Well done.
translation.zh:
我告诉他都是你的功劳
他夸赞了你的工作

translation.en: Thank you, sir.
translation.zh: 谢谢您，先生

translation.en: I've been meaning to ask you....
translation.zh: 我一直想要问你…

translation.en: That business last year about the Jewish maids...
translation.zh: 去年赶走的那两个犹太人女佣…

translation.en: ...I suppose there's no way of tracing them?
translation.zh: 有办法找到她们吗？

translation.en: That would be difficult. I tried to get them a position in Surrey.
translation.zh:
会很难
我试图帮她们在萨里找到工作

translation.en: There was room only for one, and they didn't want to be separated.
translation.zh:
他们只有一个空缺
而她们不愿意分开

translation.en: Well, try anyway. One would like to do something for them.
translation.zh:
不要停止努力
总有人愿意收留她们的

translation.en: It was wrong, what occurred.
translation.zh: 发生的事情，是不对的

translation.en: I'm sorry about it. Very sorry.
translation.zh: 我很抱歉，很遗憾

translation.en: -Good morning. -Good morning.
translation.zh:
-早上好
-早上好

translation.en: He asked about the Jewish girls.
translation.zh: 他询问了那两个犹太女孩儿

translation.en: -Elsa and Irma? -He wondered where they were.
translation.zh:
-艾尔莎和阿玛？
-他想知道她们现在在哪儿

translation.en: He said it was wrong to dismiss them.
translation.zh: 他说赶走她们是不对的

translation.en: I remember you were as distressed as I was about it.
translation.zh:
我记得你当时和我一样
非常失望

translation.en: As you were?
translation.zh: 和你一样？

translation.en: You thought it was right and proper that they should be sent packing.
translation.zh:
你认为他那样做是对的
她们应该卷铺盖离开

translation.en: Now, really, that is most unfair.
translation.zh: 的确，那样做是不公正

translation.en: Of course I was upset. Very much so.
translation.zh: 我当然很失望，非常不满

translation.en: I don't like that happening here.
translation.zh: 我不希望这里发生那样的事

translation.en: I wish you'd told me. It would've helped me to know you felt as I did.
translation.zh:
我希望你当时能告诉我
要是知道你的感受，我会好受多了

translation.en: Why do you always have to hide what you feel?
translation.zh: 为什么你总是在隐藏自己的感受？

translation.en: Lizzie.
translation.zh: 利兹

translation.en: Have you finished the lavender bags? Good.
translation.zh:
你把薰衣草的袋子弄好了吗？
很好

translation.en: -All right. -Thank you, sir.
translation.zh:
-好吧
-谢谢你，先生

translation.en: I take my hat off to you.
translation.zh: 我佩服你

translation.en: That girl's come along very well. You were right and I was wrong.
translation.zh:
那个女孩儿现在训练有素
你说得对，我错了

translation.en: -Look at that smile on your face. -What smile?
translation.zh:
-看看你脸上的笑容
-什么笑容？

translation.en: That tells a story in itself.
translation.zh: 那又是另一件有趣的故事了

translation.en: Wouldn't you say so?
translation.zh: 你说是吗？

translation.en: What story's that?
translation.zh: 什么故事？

translation.en: She's a pretty girl, don't you think?
translation.zh: 她很漂亮，你不觉得吗？

translation.en: Is she?
translation.zh: 她？

translation.en: You don't like pretty girls on the staff. I've noticed.
translation.zh:
我注意到
你不喜欢佣人当中有漂亮的姑娘

translation.en: Might it be that our Mr. Stevens fears distraction?
translation.zh: 是不是史蒂文斯先生害怕会分心呢？

translation.en: Can it be that Mr. Stevens is flesh and blood and cannot trust himself?
translation.zh:
是不是史蒂文斯先生也是血肉之躯
害怕不能把控自己？

translation.en: You know what I'm doing?
translation.zh: 你知道我在干什么吗，基顿小姐？

translation.en: I'm placing my thoughts elsewhere while you chatter away.
translation.zh: 在你胡说的时候，想其他的事情

translation.en: Why is that guilty smile still on your face?
translation.zh:
为什么你的脸上
还有那种心虚的笑容？

translation.en: Not guilty, simply amused by the nonsense you sometimes talk.
translation.zh:
那不是心虚
只是被你的胡言乱语逗乐了

translation.en: It is a guilty smile. You can't bear to look at her.
translation.zh:
就是心虚
你都不敢看她

translation.en: You didn't want her. She was too pretty.
translation.zh:
你不敢要她
因为她太漂亮了

translation.en: You must be right.
translation.zh: 你说得对

translation.en: You always are.
translation.zh: 你总是对的

translation.en: Charlie!
translation.zh: 查理！

translation.en: Lizzie, aren't you supposed to be turning down the beds?
translation.zh:
利兹
你不是应该收拾床单的吗？

translation.en: Well, you better get on with it, then.
translation.zh: 你最好马上去收拾

translation.en: Have you told her yet? You better get on with it, then.
translation.zh:
你还没跟她说？
你最好马上告诉她

translation.en: What can I say to her? She'd never understand.
translation.zh:
我跟她说什么？
她永远不会理解的

translation.en: -Why not? -She's old. She must be at least 30.
translation.zh:
-为什么不？
-因为她老了，她至少有三十岁了

translation.en: Perhaps she doesn't feel old.
translation.zh: 或许她不觉得自己老

translation.en: Who do you think those flowers are for she's been picking?
translation.zh: 她摘的那些漂亮的花是给谁的？

translation.en: Come here. Give us a kiss.
translation.zh: 过来，亲我一下

translation.en: Flowers.
translation.zh: 花

translation.en: Flowers.
translation.zh: 花

translation.en: You're reading.
translation.zh: 你在读书

translation.en: It's very dim. Can you see?
translation.zh:
这里很暗
你能看见吗？

translation.en: Yes, thank you.
translation.zh: 是的，谢谢

translation.en: What are you reading?
translation.zh: 你在读什么？

translation.en: A book.
translation.zh: 一本书

translation.en: Yes, but what sort of book?
translation.zh:
是的
但是什么书？

translation.en: It's a book, Miss Kenton. A book.
translation.zh:
只是一本书，基顿小姐
一本书

translation.en: What's the book?
translation.zh: 什么书？

translation.en: -Are you shy about your book? -No.
translation.zh:
-你害羞了吗？
-不

translation.en: What is it?
translation.zh: 是什么？

translation.en: Is it racy?
translation.zh: 是热辣小说吗？

translation.en: Racy?
translation.zh: 热辣？

translation.en: Are you reading a racy book?
translation.zh: 你在读热辣小说吗？

translation.en: Do you think racy books are to be found in His Lordship's shelves?
translation.zh:
你觉得勋爵的书架上
会有热辣小说吗？

translation.en: How would I know?
translation.zh: 我怎么会知道？

translation.en: What is it?
translation.zh: 那是什么？

translation.en: Let me see it. Let me see your book.
translation.zh:
让我看看
让我看看你的书

translation.en: Please leave me alone.
translation.zh: 请不要打扰我

translation.en: Why won't you show me your book?
translation.zh: 你为什么不肯让我看看你的书？

translation.en: This is my private time. You're invading it.
translation.zh:
这是我的私人时间
你在打扰我

translation.en: -Is that so? -Yes.
translation.zh:
-是吗？
-是的

translation.en: -I'm invading your private time, am I? -Yes.
translation.zh:
-我在打扰你的私人时间，是吗？
-是的

translation.en: What's in that book?
translation.zh: 书里是什么？

translation.en: Come on, let me see.
translation.zh: 拿过来，让我看看

translation.en: Or are you protecting me? Is that what you're doing?
translation.zh:
你是在保护我吗？
是吗？

translation.en: Would I be shocked?
translation.zh: 我会被震惊吗？

translation.en: Would it ruin my character?
translation.zh: 这会损害我的人格吗？

translation.en: Let me see it.
translation.zh: 让我看看

translation.en: Oh, dear.
translation.zh: 哦，老天

translation.en: It's not scandalous at all.
translation.zh: 一点儿也不香艳

translation.en: It's just a sentimental old love story.
translation.zh: 只不过是一本老式的爱情故事

translation.en: Yes.
translation.zh: 对

translation.en: I read these books...
translation.zh: 我读这些书…

translation.en: ...any books...
translation.zh: 任何一本书…

translation.en: ...to develop my command and knowledge of the English language.
translation.zh: 为了提高我的英语能力

translation.en: I read to further my education, Miss Kenton.
translation.zh:
我阅读是为了加强修养
基顿小姐

translation.en: I really must ask you, please...
translation.zh:
我不得不要求你
请你…

translation.en: ...not to disturb the few moments I have to myself.
translation.zh: 不要打扰属于我自己仅有的一点时间

translation.en: Come in.
translation.zh: 请进

translation.en: What is it?
translation.zh: 怎么了？

translation.en: I'm wanting to give you my notice, please.
translation.zh: 我想提出辞呈

translation.en: Why?
translation.zh: 为什么？

translation.en: Charlie and me, we're getting married.
translation.zh: 查理和我，我们要结婚了

translation.en: Oh, Lizzie....
translation.zh: 哦，利兹…

translation.en: Have you thought about this carefully?
translation.zh: 你有没有仔细想过？

translation.en: Yes, Miss Kenton, I have.
translation.zh:
是的，基顿小姐
我想过了

translation.en: You've been getting on well here and could have a fine career before you.
translation.zh:
你在这里工作的很好
会有美好的前程

translation.en: Charlie and me's getting married.
translation.zh: 查理和我要结婚了

translation.en: Charlie and I.
translation.zh: 查理和我

translation.en: I wish I knew what to say to you.
translation.zh: 我真想知道我该对你说些什么

translation.en: I've seen this happen so many times.
translation.zh: 这种事我见过很多次了

translation.en: A young girl rushing into marriage only to be disappointed in the end.
translation.zh:
一个年轻的女士仓促地步入婚姻
结局往往是失望

translation.en: What about money?
translation.zh: 钱呢？

translation.en: We don't have any.
translation.zh: 我们没有钱

translation.en: But who cares?
translation.zh: 但是谁在乎呢？

translation.en: You'll find it's not easy to live poor.
translation.zh:
你会很快发现
贫困的生活并不简单

translation.en: We have each other.
translation.zh: 我们拥有彼此

translation.en: That's all anyone can ever need.
translation.zh: 这就够了

translation.en: Very well.
translation.zh: 很好

translation.en: If you're so sure.
translation.zh: 如果你确定的话

translation.en: Yes, Miss Kenton.
translation.zh: 是的，基顿小姐

translation.en: Thank you.
translation.zh: 谢谢您

translation.en: Good luck.
translation.zh: 祝你好运

translation.en: We did all we could for them.
translation.zh: 为他们，我们已经尽力了

translation.en: I told him...
translation.zh: 我告诉过他…

translation.en: ...I had my eye on him as a possible under-butler...
translation.zh: 我认为再过几年…

translation.en: ...in a year or so.
translation.zh: 他会是当副管家的料

translation.en: But, no, Mr. Charlie knows best.
translation.zh: 但查理先生认为他什么都懂

translation.en: She's sure to be let down.
translation.zh: 她肯定会失望的

translation.en: No use crying over spilt milk.
translation.zh: 没必要为洒了的牛奶哭泣

translation.en: Besides, we have far more important matters to discuss.
translation.zh:
再说了
我们还有更要紧的事要谈

translation.en: -Next week's meeting. Now-- -Must we discuss it tonight?
translation.zh:
-下周的会议，现在…
-我们一定要现在谈这个吗？

translation.en: Sorry?
translation.zh: 对不起？

translation.en: I'm tired.
translation.zh: 我很累

translation.en: I've had a busy day. Don't you realize that?
translation.zh:
我今天太累了
你没有意识到吗？

translation.en: I'm very tired.
translation.zh: 我很累

translation.en: I'm very, very tired.
translation.zh: 我非常、非常累

translation.en: Don't you understand?
translation.zh: 你不明白吗？

translation.en: Miss Kenton, I....
translation.zh: 基顿小姐，我…

translation.en: I owe you an apology. I thought...
translation.zh:
我欠你一个道歉
我还以为…

translation.en: ...these quiet evening talks were useful to our work.
translation.zh: 安静的夜晚有助于我们的工作

translation.en: But now I see that they're a burden to you.
translation.zh: 但是现在我发现，你感到很吃力

translation.en: I was only saying I was tired tonight.
translation.zh: 我只是说，今天晚上我很累

translation.en: No, no. You're right.
translation.zh: 不，不，你说得对

translation.en: Our meetings are a burden after a long day.
translation.zh:
在一天结束之后
我们的会议是一种负担

translation.en: Perhaps we'd better discontinue them.
translation.zh: 或许我们以后也不要再开会了

translation.en: They're useful. It was only tonight.
translation.zh:
它们很有用
只是今晚我累了

translation.en: I thank you for the cocoa.
translation.zh: 谢谢你的热可可

translation.en: In the future, we shall communicate only during the day.
translation.zh:
我们以后不要再深夜沟通了
只在白天交流

translation.en: If necessary, by written message.
translation.zh: 如果有需要的话，就通信吧

translation.en: I wish you a very good night.
translation.zh: 祝你好梦

translation.en: Mr. Stevens.
translation.zh: 史蒂文斯先生

translation.en: I shall be taking my day off tomorrow.
translation.zh: 我明天想要请假

translation.en: I'll be back in the house by 9:30.
translation.zh: 我会在九点半的时候回来

translation.en: Certainly.
translation.zh: 当然

translation.en: Certainly.
translation.zh: 当然

translation.en: Good night.
translation.zh: 晚安

translation.en: I'm glad to be out of it, I can tell you.
translation.zh: 如果我能离开，我会很高兴

translation.en: There was something about Sir Geoffrey and his Black Shirts...
translation.zh: 杰弗里爵士和他的黑衬衣…

translation.en: ...gave me the creeps.
translation.zh: 一直在给我毛骨悚然

translation.en: Mr. Stevens says we should run the house...
translation.zh:
史蒂文斯先生总是说
我们应该管理这个家…

translation.en: ...and leave the rest where it belongs.
translation.zh: 其他的事情一概不管不问

translation.en: -You don't agree, Mr. Benn. -No.
translation.zh:
-你不同意，本先生
-不同意

translation.en: Nor do I, really.
translation.zh: 我也不同意

translation.en: If I don't like something, I want to say "stuff it"...
translation.zh:
如果我不喜欢一件事
我就要说“去他的”…

translation.en: ...if you'll pardon the expression, Miss Kenton.
translation.zh: 请原谅我的用词，基顿小姐

translation.en: But then I suppose I'm not a real professional, like Mr. Stevens.
translation.zh:
但是我想
我没有史蒂文斯先生那样专业

translation.en: It's Mr. Stevens' whole life.
translation.zh: 这是史蒂文斯先生的一生

translation.en: Well, it's not mine.
translation.zh: 这不是我的一生

translation.en: And to tell you the truth...
translation.zh: 跟你说实话吧…

translation.en: ...I don't want to go back in service.
translation.zh: 我不想要再回去做佣人了

translation.en: -What would you do instead, Mr. Benn? -Tom's the name.
translation.zh:
-你想要做什么，本先生？
-叫我汤姆

translation.en: Tom.
translation.zh: 汤姆

translation.en: What employment would you take up?
translation.zh: 你要从事什么职业？

translation.en: I'd really like to be on my own.
translation.zh: 我想要独立

translation.en: Start a little shop somewhere, newspapers and tobacco.
translation.zh:
到一个小地方开个小店
买点儿报纸香烟什么的…

translation.en: Or a boarding house in the west country, where I come from.
translation.zh:
或者开间小旅馆
到西边的乡下，我的故乡

translation.en: Clevedon's a good place for a boarding house.
translation.zh: 克利文顿是个开旅馆的好地方

translation.en: Would I get you another shandy?
translation.zh: 还要再来一杯姜汁啤酒吗？

translation.en: Well, it's almost 9:30....
translation.zh: 已经快九点半了…

translation.en: Go on!
translation.zh: 得了！

translation.en: It's your day off, isn't it?
translation.zh: 今天你不上班，不是吗？

translation.en: You're not in the army, due back in the barracks.
translation.zh: 你又不是在军队，得回营房去

translation.en: -All right, then. -Good.
translation.zh:
-说得对，好吧
-很好

translation.en: Half a shandy, please.
translation.zh: 请再来半杯姜汁啤酒

translation.en: What about yourself, then, Sarah?
translation.zh: 那你呢，莎拉？

translation.en: That's a serious sort of a name.
translation.zh: 真是个严肃的名字

translation.en: They called me Sally when my mum was alive.
translation.zh:
我母亲在世的时候
他们叫我萨里

translation.en: Sally. That's nice.
translation.zh: 萨里很好听

translation.en: Is it your intention to remain in service?
translation.zh: 你想要一辈子当女管家吗？

translation.en: It's a good profession, when you have a position.
translation.zh:
这是个很好的职业
一旦做到一定地位

translation.en: -Mr. Stevens says we're fortunate-- -We're not talking about him.
translation.zh:
-史蒂文斯先生说我们很幸运…
-我们不要谈他了

translation.en: We're talking about you.
translation.zh: 我们谈论的是你

translation.en: Supposing...
translation.zh: 假设…

translation.en: ...someone asked if you'd like to come in on a boarding house by the sea?
translation.zh:
有人问你愿不愿意
跟他去海边的小旅馆？

translation.en: What would you say?
translation.zh: 你会怎么说？

translation.en: Well, I don't know.
translation.zh: 这个嘛，我不知道

translation.en: It's a theoretical question, so I haven't given it any thought...
translation.zh:
这是个假设的问题
我还没有想…

translation.en: -...Mr. Benn. -Tom.
translation.zh:
-本先生
-汤姆

translation.en: Supposing it wasn't theoretical...
translation.zh: 假如这不是假设…

translation.en: ...Sally?
translation.zh: 萨里？

translation.en: It's been years since I've been called that. It feels funny.
translation.zh:
很多年没有人那么叫我了
感觉很好笑

translation.en: Nice, though?
translation.zh: 你喜欢，不是吗？

translation.en: Yes.
translation.zh: 是的

translation.en: It's very late.
translation.zh: 太晚了

translation.en: Will there be anything else?
translation.zh: 还有别的事吗？

translation.en: What?
translation.zh: 什么？

translation.en: Oh, Stevens.
translation.zh: 哦，史蒂文斯

translation.en: No. No.
translation.zh: 不，没有了

translation.en: -Thank you. Good night. -Good night, my lord.
translation.zh:
-谢谢你，晚安
-晚安，大人

translation.en: Mr. Cardinal, good evening.
translation.zh: 卡迪那先生，晚上好

translation.en: -How are you? -Very well.
translation.zh:
-你好吗？
-很好

translation.en: -Delighted. And your wife? -Very well too, sir.
translation.zh:
-很高兴，你的妻子好吗？
-很好，谢谢你

translation.en: -Good evening, sir. -Stevens.
translation.zh:
-晚上好，先生
-史蒂文斯

translation.en: -How are you? -Very well, sir.
translation.zh:
-你好吗？
-很好，先生

translation.en: I've gone and got myself in a bit of a mess with arrangements.
translation.zh: 我忙着订婚的事情，有点麻烦

translation.en: Would His Lordship put me up?
translation.zh: 你觉得勋爵大人会让我留宿吗？

translation.en: -I'll tell him you're here. -Thanks.
translation.zh:
-我会通知他您来了
-谢谢

translation.en: I hope there's nothing special tonight.
translation.zh: 我希望今晚没有什么特别的事

translation.en: His Lordship expects some gentlemen after dinner.
translation.zh: 晚饭后会有来宾拜访勋爵大人

translation.en: I'll keep my head down, then. I've got to write my column anyway.
translation.zh:
那我就保持安静吧
反正我也要写我的专栏

translation.en: -You're in time for dinner, if you like. -I hoped I would be.
translation.zh:
-如果您愿意，可以用点晚餐
-当然好了

translation.en: How is my godfather? Fit?
translation.zh:
我的教父还好吗？
很健康吗？

translation.en: Very well. Some refreshment?
translation.zh:
非常健康
您要用点心吗？

translation.en: Thank you. Some whiskey would be lovely.
translation.zh: 谢谢你，来一点儿威士忌吧

translation.en: -Who's he expecting tonight? -I am unable to help you there.
translation.zh:
-他今晚要见谁？
-我不知道

translation.en: What, no idea?
translation.zh: 怎么，你不知道？

translation.en: No idea at all, sir.
translation.zh: 一点不知道，先生

translation.en: -I'll keep my head down all the same. -I think it's a good idea, sir.
translation.zh:
-我还是会老老实实的
-我想那是好主意，先生

translation.en: Come in.
translation.zh: 请进

translation.en: Ah, Miss Kenton.
translation.zh: 基顿小姐

translation.en: Mr. Cardinal has just arrived, out of the blue.
translation.zh: 卡迪那先生刚刚到，非常意外

translation.en: He'll expect his usual room.
translation.zh: 他会在他通常暂住的房间休息

translation.en: -I'll see to it before I leave. -You're going out?
translation.zh:
-在我离开前我会去整理的
-你要出门吗？

translation.en: I am indeed.
translation.zh: 是的

translation.en: It's Thursday.
translation.zh: 今天是周四

translation.en: Of course. I'd forgotten. Sorry.
translation.zh:
我给忘了
对不起

translation.en: Is something the matter?
translation.zh: 有什么不对的吗？

translation.en: No, no.
translation.zh: 没什么

translation.en: Some visitors are arriving, but it doesn't involve you.
translation.zh:
今晚会有客人来访
但是应该不会影响你

translation.en: We agreed that Thursday is my day off...
translation.zh:
我们说好的
周四是我休息的日子…

translation.en: ...but if you need me urgently--
translation.zh: 但是如果你临时需要我…

translation.en: No, it's perfectly all right. Thank you.
translation.zh:
不，没关系
谢谢你

translation.en: -Mr. Stevens. -Yes?
translation.zh:
-史蒂文斯先生
-什么事？

translation.en: I have something to tell you.
translation.zh: 我有件事要告诉你

translation.en: My friend...
translation.zh: 我的朋友…

translation.en: ...the man I'm meeting, Mr. Benn.
translation.zh:
我见面的那个男人
本先生…

translation.en: Mr. Benn. Of course. Yes.
translation.zh: 本先生，是的

translation.en: He has asked me to marry him.
translation.zh: 他要我嫁给他

translation.en: I am thinking about it.
translation.zh: 我在考虑

translation.en: I see.
translation.zh: 我知道了

translation.en: He's moving to the west country next month.
translation.zh: 下个月他就要搬到西部去

translation.en: I'm still thinking about it.
translation.zh: 我还在考虑

translation.en: I thought you should be informed of the situation.
translation.zh: 我认为你应该知情

translation.en: Yes, thank you.
translation.zh: 是的，谢谢你

translation.en: That's most kind of you.
translation.zh: 非常感谢你

translation.en: Well....
translation.zh: 这个嘛…

translation.en: I trust you'll have a most pleasant evening.
translation.zh: 我相信你今晚一定会玩得高兴

translation.en: Thank you.
translation.zh: 谢谢你

translation.en: Is there something special tonight?
translation.zh: 今晚有什么特别的吗？

translation.en: Are your visitors special?
translation.zh: 您的客人很特别吗？

translation.en: Can't tell you, my boy. Strictly confidential.
translation.zh:
不能告诉你，我的孩子
要严格保密

translation.en: -So I can't sit in on it? -On what?
translation.zh:
-所以我不能出席？
-出席什么？

translation.en: -Whatever it is that's taking place. -Absolutely not.
translation.zh:
-您待会儿要举行的会议
-当然不行

translation.en: Can't have someone like you sticking your nose in. A journalist.
translation.zh:
不能让一个你这样的人参与
记者

translation.en: What do you call it, a "newshound"?
translation.zh:
你管他们叫什么？
“狗仔队”？

translation.en: No, it wouldn't do at all.
translation.zh: 不，绝对不行

translation.en: Once you've had your food, you'd better make yourself scarce.
translation.zh: 你吃完，最好就更回避一下

translation.en: It sounds pretty special to me.
translation.zh: 我听起来可挺特别

translation.en: Good evening, prime minister.
translation.zh: 晚上好，首相

translation.en: -Sorry, we've been delayed. -I understand.
translation.zh:
-对不起，我们迟到了
-我能理解

translation.en: Lord Halifax.
translation.zh: 哈利法克斯勋爵

translation.en: -Very nice to see you. -This is Mr. Fraser.
translation.zh:
-很高兴见到您
-这位是弗雷泽先生

translation.en: How do you do, Mr. Fraser?
translation.zh: 您好吗，弗雷泽先生？

translation.en: Good evening, Your Excellency.
translation.zh: 晚上好，大人

translation.en: Please wait here, Your Excellency. I'll inform His Lordship.
translation.zh:
请在这里等待，大人
我会通知勋爵的

translation.en: Thank you.
translation.zh: 谢谢你

translation.en: -Ambassador. -Lord Darlington.
translation.zh:
-大使先生
-达林顿勋爵

translation.en: How do you do?
translation.zh: 您好吗？

translation.en: We don't intend to involve the whole British Empire in a war...
translation.zh: 我们不想把整个大英帝国牵入战事…

translation.en: ...simply because of a quarrel in a faraway country...
translation.zh: 只是为了一个遥远的国家…

translation.en: ...between people of whom we know nothing.
translation.zh: 完全陌生的人之间的冲突

translation.en: To my mind, the whole of Czechoslovakia...
translation.zh: 在我看来，整个捷克斯洛伐克…

translation.en: ...isn't worth a single one of our own young men.
translation.zh: 还不及你们当中的一个年轻人

translation.en: We have a small, noisy and corrupt war group here...
translation.zh:
我们这里有一个人数不多
但吵杂又腐败的好战团体…

translation.en: ...who don't realize that you Germans are marching into your own back yard.
translation.zh:
他们还没有意识到你们德国人
已经快践踏他们的后院了

translation.en: The Führer is a man of peace to the depth of his soul...
translation.zh: 元首的内心深处渴望和平…

translation.en: ...but he won't allow a small second-rate country...
translation.zh: 但是他决不允许一个二等小国…

translation.en: ...to thumb its nose at the 1000-year German Reich.
translation.zh: 对有一千年历史的德意志国指手画脚

translation.en: I'll get it.
translation.zh: 我去应呼

translation.en: Come on, wake up!
translation.zh: 快，快醒醒！

translation.en: Stay awake!
translation.zh: 清醒起来！

translation.en: Could you confirm that this lady is on the staff here?
translation.zh:
你能否确认一下
这位女士在侍者之列？

translation.en: Yes, of course. She's the housekeeper.
translation.zh: 当然，她是女管家

translation.en: Thank you, sir.
translation.zh: 谢谢你，先生

translation.en: -May I? -Of course.
translation.zh:
-我可以吗？
-当然

translation.en: Sorry to have alarmed you.
translation.zh: 很抱歉打扰你了

translation.en: Just security, miss.
translation.zh: 出于安全考虑而已，小姐

translation.en: I trust you've had a pleasant evening.
translation.zh: 我相信你的夜晚很愉快

translation.en: Well, did you have a pleasant evening?
translation.zh: 你的夜晚愉快吗？

translation.en: -Yes, thank you. -Good.
translation.zh:
-是的，谢谢
-很好

translation.en: Would you like to know what took place?
translation.zh: 你想知道发生了什么吗？

translation.en: I have to return upstairs.
translation.zh: 我必须要回楼上去

translation.en: There are important events taking place tonight.
translation.zh: 今晚有很重要的会议

translation.en: When are there not?
translation.zh: 什么时候它们不重要？

translation.en: -I accepted his proposal. -Miss Kenton?
translation.zh:
-我接受了他的求婚
-基顿小姐？

translation.en: I accepted Mr. Benn's proposal of marriage.
translation.zh: 我接受了本先生向我求婚的要求

translation.en: My congratulations.
translation.zh: 我祝贺你

translation.en: I am prepared to serve out my notice.
translation.zh: 我准备好在交接期继续做工

translation.en: But if you'd release me earlier, I'd be grateful.
translation.zh:
如果你能早一点儿让我走人
我会很感激

translation.en: Mr. Benn is planning to leave for the west country in two weeks.
translation.zh:
本先生计划在两周内
离开这里，前往西部

translation.en: I'll do my best.
translation.zh: 我会尽力的

translation.en: Now, please excuse me.
translation.zh: 请允许我先离开

translation.en: -Mr. Stevens. -Yes, Miss Kenton?
translation.zh:
-史蒂文斯先生
-什么事，基顿小姐？

translation.en: After all the years I have been here, you have nothing else to say?
translation.zh:
我在这儿这么多年
你对我没什么其他话要说吗？

translation.en: You have my warmest congratulations.
translation.zh: 请接收我最诚挚的祝福

translation.en: You've been a very important figure...
translation.zh: 对我和本先生来说…

translation.en: ...for Mr. Benn and me.
translation.zh: 你一直是一个很重要的人

translation.en: Oh, in what way?
translation.zh: 哦，在什么方面？

translation.en: I tell him all sorts of things about you.
translation.zh: 我告诉他很多关于你的事

translation.en: I tell him stories about you. About your habits.
translation.zh:
我告诉他关于你的故事
还有你的习惯

translation.en: About your mannerisms.
translation.zh: 还有你的作风

translation.en: He finds it very funny, especially when I show him how...
translation.zh:
他觉得你很有趣
我告诉他…

translation.en: ...you pinch your nose when you put pepper on your food.
translation.zh:
当你洒胡椒到饭菜里时
你会捏你的鼻子

translation.en: That always has us in stitches.
translation.zh: 那总是让我们大笑

translation.en: Does it, indeed?
translation.zh: 是吗？

translation.en: Well, please...
translation.zh: 这个嘛，请…

translation.en: ...excuse me, Miss Kenton.
translation.zh: 我得走了，基顿小姐

translation.en: Good night.
translation.zh: 晚安

translation.en: Thanks.
translation.zh: 谢谢

translation.en: We've been friends a long time, haven't we?
translation.zh:
我们是很多年的朋友了
是吗？

translation.en: Yes, sir.
translation.zh: 是的，先生

translation.en: I always look forward to a chat when I come here.
translation.zh: 我总是很期待和你的对话

translation.en: Would you care to join me in a drink?
translation.zh: 想要和我喝一杯吗？

translation.en: That's most kind of you, but no, thank you.
translation.zh: 非常感谢，但是不用了

translation.en: You all right?
translation.zh: 你还好吗？

translation.en: I'm perfectly all right.
translation.zh: 我非常好

translation.en: Not feeling unwell, are you?
translation.zh: 感觉不舒服吗？

translation.en: No, no. A little tired, perhaps.
translation.zh:
不，不
只是有一点儿累

translation.en: I bet you're tired. What is it, about 1:00?
translation.zh:
我猜你肯定累了
现在几点了，一点？

translation.en: Come on.
translation.zh: 过来

translation.en: I want you to sit down.
translation.zh: 我想让你坐下

translation.en: Well, sir, I really--
translation.zh:
这个嘛
先生，我真的…

translation.en: Look....
translation.zh: 听着…

translation.en: I didn't come here by accident.
translation.zh: 我来这里不是个意外

translation.en: You know that.
translation.zh: 你知道的

translation.en: I had a tip-off, you see...
translation.zh: 有人给我报了信…

translation.en: ...about what's going on now in the library.
translation.zh: 关于现在书房里发生的事情

translation.en: I wish you'd sit down. I'm your friend...
translation.zh:
我希望你能坐下
我是你的朋友…

translation.en: ...and you're holding that tray as if you're about to wander off!
translation.zh:
你举着那只盘子
好像随时会溜达出去！

translation.en: Now, come on. Sit down, damn it!
translation.zh: 过来，坐下，拜托！

translation.en: That's better.
translation.zh: 好多了

translation.en: Now, look, I don't suppose the prime minister is in the library, is he?
translation.zh:
听着，我想首相应该不会在书房内
是吗？

translation.en: Prime minister, sir?
translation.zh: 首相，先生？

translation.en: In the library-- You don't have to confirm it--
translation.zh:
书房里…
你不需要回答…

translation.en: --are our prime minister, our foreign secretary and the German ambassador.
translation.zh:
我们的首相，外交部长
还有德国大使

translation.en: -Any idea what they're talking about? -I'm afraid not.
translation.zh:
-你知道他们在谈论什么吗？
-我不知道

translation.en: Tell me, Stevens, don't you care at all?
translation.zh:
告诉我，史蒂文斯
你一点儿也不在乎吗？

translation.en: Aren't you in the least bit curious?
translation.zh: 你一点儿也不好奇吗？

translation.en: It's not my place to be curious about such matters.
translation.zh: 我没有权利对这些事情好奇

translation.en: Not your place.
translation.zh: 你没有权利

translation.en: And supposing I told you that His Lordship...
translation.zh: 如果我告诉你勋爵大人…

translation.en: ...is trying to persuade the prime minister...
translation.zh: 正在试图说服首相…

translation.en: ...to enter into a pact with that bunch of criminals in Berlin?
translation.zh: 跟柏林的那些罪犯达成协议呢？

translation.en: I'm certain His Lordship is acting from the highest and noblest motives.
translation.zh:
我肯定勋爵大人做事
都是出于最高尚的动机

translation.en: Don't you see? That's exactly what makes it so abominable!
translation.zh:
你还看不出吗？
这才是这件事这么可恶的原因！

translation.en: Twisting these high and noble motives to their own foul ends!
translation.zh: 利用高尚的动机成就他们的丑陋行为

translation.en: You do, please, realize that His Lordship's been the most...
translation.zh: 你肯定意识到勋爵大人一直以来…

translation.en: ...valuable pawn that the Nazis have in this country...
translation.zh: 就是纳粹在这个国家最有用的傀儡…

translation.en: ...precisely because he is good and honorable?
translation.zh: 就因为他的声望？

translation.en: If I weren't so drunk, I could make you understand!
translation.zh:
如果我现在没有喝醉
我就能说明白！

translation.en: Sir...
translation.zh: 先生…

translation.en: ...I do understand.
translation.zh: 我明白

translation.en: His Lordship is working to ensure peace in our time.
translation.zh: 勋爵大人在努力维持我们时代的和平

translation.en: Peace in our time on their beastly terms!
translation.zh:
我们时代的和平
以他们野蛮的条约为代价！

translation.en: Remember that American here at the conference?
translation.zh: 记得那个会议上发言的美国人吗？

translation.en: Called Lord Darlington an amateur, out of his depth?
translation.zh: 他管达林顿勋爵叫做业余人士？

translation.en: Well, he was right.
translation.zh: 他说得对

translation.en: He was dead right.
translation.zh: 他说的太对了

translation.en: I hardly have to tell you how I feel towards His Lordship.
translation.zh:
我不需要跟你解释
我对勋爵大人的感受

translation.en: I care about him deeply, and I know you do too.
translation.zh: 我深切地关心他，和你一样

translation.en: Yes, I do indeed.
translation.zh: 是的，我真是关心他

translation.en: Then aren't you desperate to see him make this mistake?
translation.zh:
那你看到他犯这么严重的错误
难道不痛心吗？

translation.en: He's being tricked! Don't you see? Or are you as deluded as he is?
translation.zh:
他被骗了！你看不出来吗？
还是说你和他一样迷了魂？

translation.en: Oh, dear. Now I've probably offended you.
translation.zh: 老天，我可能冒犯了你

translation.en: No. Not at all, sir.
translation.zh: 不，压根没有，先生

translation.en: Not at all.
translation.zh: 一点没有

translation.en: You must excuse me.
translation.zh: 请原谅

translation.en: There are other gentlemen calling for me, sir.
translation.zh: 还有别的先生需要我，先生

translation.en: You mustn't take anything I said to heart.
translation.zh: 请不要介意我的话

translation.en: I was very foolish a little while ago.
translation.zh: 刚才我像个傻瓜

translation.en: Miss, Kenton, I haven't taken anything you said to heart.
translation.zh:
基顿小姐
我从来没有介意过你说的话

translation.en: In fact, I can hardly recall anything you did say.
translation.zh:
实际上
我记不得你说过的话了

translation.en: I was just being very foolish.
translation.zh: 我只是很傻

translation.en: I simply haven't time to stand here with you, engaging in idle talk.
translation.zh: 我只是没有时间陪你、和你闲聊

translation.en: I suggest you go to bed now. You must be very tired.
translation.zh:
我建议你现在上床去睡觉
你一定很累了

translation.en: Good night, Miss Kenton.
translation.zh: 晚安，基顿小姐

translation.en: Oh, damn it!
translation.zh: 该死！

translation.en: Blast!
translation.zh: 该死！

translation.en: Miss Kenton....
translation.zh: 基顿小姐…

translation.en: Yes, Mr. Stevens.
translation.zh: 是的，史蒂文斯先生

translation.en: Miss Kenton, I....
translation.zh: 基顿小姐，我…

translation.en: I'd been wanting to tell you....
translation.zh: 我一直想告诉你…

translation.en: It's the small alcove outside the breakfast room.
translation.zh: 就是早餐室外面的小壁龛

translation.en: It's the new girl, of course...
translation.zh: 肯定是新来的女佣干的…

translation.en: ...but I find it has not been dusted in some time.
translation.zh: 但是我发现很久没有人打扫了

translation.en: I'll see to it.
translation.zh: 我会清理的

translation.en: Thank you.
translation.zh: 谢谢你

translation.en: I knew you would have wanted to be informed.
translation.zh: 我想你应该知道

translation.en: Miss Kenton.
translation.zh: 基顿小姐

translation.en: Hello, Sally.
translation.zh: 你好，萨里

translation.en: Hi, Tom.
translation.zh: 你好，汤姆…

translation.en: -You all right, then? -Yes.
translation.zh:
-你还好吗？
-很好

translation.en: How are you?
translation.zh: 你好吗？

translation.en: I'm good.
translation.zh: 我很好

translation.en: Could we...?
translation.zh: 我们能不能…？

translation.en: Could we talk for a moment, please? Just for a moment.
translation.zh:
我们能不能谈一谈？
就一分钟

translation.en: We'll have to be quick because I'm going out.
translation.zh:
我们得长话短说
因为我要出门了

translation.en: It won't take long.
translation.zh: 不会太久的

translation.en: All right, then. We'll have to go into the lounge.
translation.zh:
好吧
我们去休息室说吧

translation.en: -Afternoon. -Hello.
translation.zh:
-下午好
-你好

translation.en: Nice little place, isn't it?
translation.zh: 这里很可爱，不是吗？

translation.en: The sort of quiet little boarding house I had in mind for us.
translation.zh: 我想象中的小旅馆就是这个样子

translation.en: Like other things, it didn't work out.
translation.zh: 就像其他的事，又失败了

translation.en: What did you want to say?
translation.zh: 你要说什么，汤姆？

translation.en: I saw Catherine yesterday. She had some interesting news.
translation.zh:
昨天我看见了凯瑟琳
她给我说了一些有趣的新闻

translation.en: -She's expecting. -Oh, my goodness!
translation.zh:
-她要生了
-哦，我的天！

translation.en: She wants us both over for tea on Sunday.
translation.zh: 她想下周日邀请我们一起喝下午茶

translation.en: I could come and get you.
translation.zh: 我可以来接你

translation.en: We could go together on the bus.
translation.zh: 我们可以坐巴士一起去

translation.en: Yes, well, we'll see about that.
translation.zh: 是的，我们再说吧

translation.en: House is that empty without you.
translation.zh: 没有了你，房子里空荡荡的

translation.en: I can't tell you.
translation.zh: 我不知该怎么说

translation.en: You cut yourself shaving.
translation.zh: 你该刮胡子割了脸

translation.en: Oh, yeah. I know.
translation.zh: 我知道

translation.en: Can't seem to do anything right these days.
translation.zh: 这些天什么都做不好

translation.en: I so often think of the good old days...
translation.zh: “我常常想起我在达林顿…

translation.en: ...when I was housekeeper at Darlington Hall.
translation.zh: 做女管家时的美好的日子”

translation.en: Those years with you were the happiest of my life.
translation.zh:
“但是与你共事那些年
依然是我人生中最开心的时光”

translation.en: Would you like more tea?
translation.zh: 你想要加点儿茶吗？

translation.en: Yes, please. Thank you.
translation.zh: 是的，谢谢

translation.en: Miss Kenton. I'm sorry, Mrs. Benn.
translation.zh:
基顿小姐
我很抱歉，是本太太

translation.en: -Sorry, I was delayed. -That's all right.
translation.zh:
-对不起，我迟到了
-没关系

translation.en: Please sit down.
translation.zh: 请坐
嗯…

translation.en: -I've ordered some fresh tea. -Lovely.
translation.zh:
-我点了一点儿新鲜的茶
-很好

translation.en: -Would you like some cake? -No, thank you.
translation.zh:
-你想要来点儿蛋糕吗？
-不了，谢谢

translation.en: -Sure? -All right. It's a special occasion.
translation.zh:
-确定吗？
-好吧，今天很特殊

translation.en: Good.
translation.zh: 很好

translation.en: Waitress?
translation.zh: 服务员？

translation.en: -Could we have some cake? -Yes, of course.
translation.zh:
-我们可以点一点儿蛋糕吗？
-当然

translation.en: -It's been a long time. -Yes, indeed.
translation.zh:
-好久不见了
-是的

translation.en: You haven't changed at all.
translation.zh: 你一点儿也没变

translation.en: Well....
translation.zh: 这个嘛…

translation.en: A little, perhaps.
translation.zh: 还是有一点儿

translation.en: We've all changed, I think.
translation.zh: 我想我们都变了

translation.en: I'd have known you anywhere.
translation.zh: 我在哪儿都能认出你

translation.en: How long's it been? Twenty years?
translation.zh:
有多久了？
二十年了？

translation.en: Yes, just over, I think.
translation.zh: 是的，刚刚过二十年

translation.en: The tea should be along.
translation.zh: 茶应该来了

translation.en: We read about the suit for libel.
translation.zh: 我们听说了勋爵起诉诽谤的事

translation.en: It's a shame...
translation.zh: 很遗憾…

translation.en: ...calling His Lordship a traitor. Those papers will print anything.
translation.zh:
叫勋爵为叛徒
这些报纸什么都登

translation.en: They should have lost the case.
translation.zh: 他们应该败诉

translation.en: Yes.
translation.zh: 是的

translation.en: When His Lordship went to court...
translation.zh: 当勋爵上庭的时候…

translation.en: ...he sincerely expected he would get justice.
translation.zh: 他很期待得到公正的判决

translation.en: Instead, the newspaper increased its circulation, and His Lordship's...
translation.zh: 相反地，报纸销量上升，而勋爵…

translation.en: ...good name was destroyed forever.
translation.zh: 却从此名誉扫地

translation.en: And....
translation.zh: 还有…

translation.en: Afterwards, in his last years, well...
translation.zh: 之后，在他的晚年…

translation.en: ...quite honestly, Mrs. Benn...
translation.zh: 说实话，本太太…

translation.en: ...his heart was broken.
translation.zh: 他心碎了

translation.en: I'd take him tea in the library, and he'd be sitting there...
translation.zh:
我把茶端进书房
他就坐在那儿…

translation.en: ...and he wouldn't even see me, so deep was he in his own thoughts.
translation.zh:
他甚至不抬头看我
沉浸在他自己的思考中

translation.en: And his....
translation.zh: 他…

translation.en: He'd be talking to himself...
translation.zh: 开始自言自语…

translation.en: ...as though he was arguing with someone.
translation.zh: 就好像他在跟别人争论

translation.en: There was no one, of course.
translation.zh: 当然了，没有其他人

translation.en: No one came to see him anymore.
translation.zh: 不再有人来拜访他

translation.en: What about his godson, young Mr. Cardinal?
translation.zh: 那他的教子卡迪那先生？

translation.en: Mr. Cardinal was killed in the war. Waitress.
translation.zh:
卡迪那在战争中牺牲了
服务员

translation.en: May I have my bill, please?
translation.zh: 我可以买单吗？

translation.en: I'm very sorry.
translation.zh: 我很抱歉

translation.en: Yes.
translation.zh: 是的

translation.en: I know you remember Darlington Hall in its best days...
translation.zh:
我知道你记忆中
还是达林顿庄园最繁盛的模样…

translation.en: ...and that's how His Lordship deserves to be remembered.
translation.zh:
勋爵大人就应该
以那时的样子被人铭记

translation.en: But perhaps the good days are back, now that Mr. Lewis is here...
translation.zh:
但是现在好日子要来了
路易斯先生已经搬进来了…

translation.en: ...and Mrs. Lewis is arriving shortly.
translation.zh: 很快路易斯太太也要过来

translation.en: Very fortunate to have you running the house.
translation.zh: 他们有你管家真是幸运

translation.en: We still have problems, Miss Kenton. I'm sorry. Mrs. Benn.
translation.zh:
我们依然有麻烦，基顿小姐
我很抱歉，本太太

translation.en: -We still have staff problems. -You mentioned it in your letter.
translation.zh:
-我们还是有人员问题
-你在信里提过了

translation.en: Frankly, I've been thinking of going back in service.
translation.zh:
说实话
我一直在想要不要回去

translation.en: Good--
translation.zh: 很好…

translation.en: But now the situation has changed for me.
translation.zh: 但是现在情况有变

translation.en: If I take up any work, it will have to be...
translation.zh: 如果我要找工作，就必须是…

translation.en: ...here in the west country...
translation.zh: 在西部这里…

translation.en: ...because Catherine, our daughter, is expecting a baby.
translation.zh: 因为我的女儿凯瑟琳要生小宝宝了

translation.en: So I would like to be near her.
translation.zh: 我想要离她近些

translation.en: Of course.
translation.zh: 那当然

translation.en: And to be near our grandchild as he grows up.
translation.zh: 外孙长大的过程中陪伴着他

translation.en: -Naturally. -Or her, if it's a little girl.
translation.zh:
-那是自然
-或者是外孙女

translation.en: When I left Darlington Hall, all those years ago...
translation.zh: 当我多年前离开达林顿庄园的时候…

translation.en: ...I never realized I was really, truly leaving.
translation.zh: 我并没有觉得我是离开了

translation.en: I believe I thought of it as simply another ruse...
translation.zh: 我以为那只不过是… 我要让你生气的一个诡计

translation.en: ...to annoy you.
translation.zh: 我要让你生气的一个诡计

translation.en: It was a shock to come out here and find myself actually married.
translation.zh:
来到这里发现自己已经结婚了
让我感到很震惊

translation.en: For a long time, I was...
translation.zh: 很长一段时间以来我一直都…

translation.en: ...very unhappy.
translation.zh: 闷闷不乐

translation.en: But then Catherine was born, the years went by and one day...
translation.zh:
但是后来凯瑟琳出生了
日子过得很快…

translation.en: ...I realized I loved my husband.
translation.zh: 我意识到我爱着我的丈夫

translation.en: You see, there is no one...
translation.zh: 要知道，这个世界上…

translation.en: ...no one in the world who needs me as much as he does.
translation.zh: 没有人比他更需要我

translation.en: But still there are times...
translation.zh: 但是还是有时候…

translation.en: ...when I think I made a terrible mistake with my life.
translation.zh: 我认为我做了一个错误的决定

translation.en: Yeah.
translation.zh: 是的

translation.en: I'm sure we all have these thoughts...
translation.zh: 我想我们时不时地…

translation.en: ...from time to time.
translation.zh: 都会这样想

translation.en: Yes.
translation.zh: 是的

translation.en: People always cheer when they turn the lights on in the evening.
translation.zh:
当夜幕降临，街灯被点亮时
人们总是欢呼

translation.en: I wonder why.
translation.zh: 我总是不明白

translation.en: They do say...
translation.zh: 他们说…

translation.en: ...that for many people, the evening's the best part of the day.
translation.zh:
对于很多人来说
夜晚是最美好的时光

translation.en: The part they most look forward to.
translation.zh: 他们最期待的就是夜晚

translation.en: Is that so?
translation.zh: 是吗？

translation.en: What do you most look forward to?
translation.zh: 你最期待什么？

translation.en: Getting back to Darlington Hall, principally...
translation.zh: 回到达林顿庄园…

translation.en: ...and straightening out our staff problems.
translation.zh: 解决我们面对的人员危机

translation.en: You were always able to do that.
translation.zh: 你总是那么尽职尽责

translation.en: And you had quite a few to straighten out, as I remember.
translation.zh:
我记得
你是有好几个人需要教训

translation.en: Yes.
translation.zh: 是的

translation.en: Always was work, work and more work...
translation.zh:
总是工作，工作
更多的工作…

translation.en: ...and will continue to be so, I have no doubt.
translation.zh: 毫无疑问，以后将继续如此

translation.en: Mr. Stevens, don't you wait! That bus is always late.
translation.zh:
史蒂文斯先生，别等啦！
巴士总是会迟到

translation.en: Come in out of the wet.
translation.zh: 进来吧，别淋湿了

translation.en: You must take good care of yourself.
translation.zh: 你要好好照顾自己

translation.en: -You too, promise me that. -Oh, yes, I promise.
translation.zh:
-你也是，向我保证
-是的，我保证

translation.en: Do all you can to make these years happy for yourself and your husband.
translation.zh:
尽你所能
让你和你的丈夫快乐

translation.en: We may never meet again, Mrs. Benn.
translation.zh:
我们或许再也不会见面了
本太太

translation.en: That is why I am being personal, if you will forgive me.
translation.zh:
所以我才敢这么大胆
请你原谅

translation.en: Thank you, Mr. Stevens.
translation.zh: 谢谢你，史蒂文斯先生

translation.en: Oh, here it comes. It's on time for once.
translation.zh:
巴士来了
这一次它准时了

translation.en: Thank you. And thank you so very much for coming.
translation.zh:
谢谢你
谢谢你来看我

translation.en: It was so very kind of you.
translation.zh: 我很感谢你

translation.en: It was so nice to see you.
translation.zh: 很高兴见到你

translation.en: It was a pleasure to see you again. Goodbye.
translation.zh:
我也很高兴见到你
再见了

translation.en: Take care.
translation.zh: 保重

translation.en: Goodbye.
translation.zh: 再见

translation.en: Ah, Stevens.
translation.zh: 史蒂文斯

translation.en: You scared me. Where'd you come from?
translation.zh:
你吓到我了
你从哪儿来？

translation.en: Good morning, sir.
translation.zh: 早上好，先生

translation.en: You like the suit?
translation.zh: 我的西装怎么样？

translation.en: Very good, sir.
translation.zh: 很好，先生

translation.en: Thank you.
translation.zh: 谢谢你

translation.en: Good.
translation.zh: 很好

translation.en: Watch the chandelier there.
translation.zh: 小心水晶吊灯

translation.en: Okay.
translation.zh: 好的

translation.en: You're really getting things going here. This is wonderful!
translation.zh:
你真的很有一手
真是太好了！

translation.en: Thank you, sir.
translation.zh: 谢谢您，先生

translation.en: I've had to ask another three girls from the village to come up.
translation.zh: 我要再招三名村里的女孩儿

translation.en: And I can promise you that the house will be ready...
translation.zh:
我向您保证
在路易斯太太到来之前…

translation.en: ...and in shape by the time Mrs. Lewis arrives.
translation.zh: 这里会一切准备就绪

translation.en: -That sounds good. -Thank you, sir.
translation.zh:
-听起来不错
-谢谢您，先生

translation.en: I'm expecting a possible new housekeeper this afternoon.
translation.zh: 今天下午会有一个新女管家

translation.en: A Mrs. Ruth Muspratt.
translation.zh: 她叫露丝·马斯普拉特

translation.en: Excellent references. She was matron at a boys' school in Sussex.
translation.zh:
经历丰富
她是苏塞克斯的男校的女管理员

translation.en: -A matron? -Yes, sir.
translation.zh:
-女管理员？
-是的，先生

translation.en: Sounds like she'll keep us from misbehaving.
translation.zh: 听起来她一定会监督我们的行为规范

translation.en: -I certainly hope so, sir. -Good.
translation.zh:
-我希望如此，先生
-很好

translation.en: Good, Stevens. Very good.
translation.zh:
很好，史蒂文斯
很好

translation.en: This is where we had that banquet back in '35. Remember?
translation.zh:
这就是我们1935年举行晚宴的地方
你还记得吗？

translation.en: We all stood up and delivered ourselves of our principles.
translation.zh:
我们都站在这儿
发表自己的看法

translation.en: God knows what I said. Sure got worked up about it, though.
translation.zh:
上帝知道我都说了什么
反正是很激动

translation.en: What did I say, anyway?
translation.zh: 我到底说了什么？

translation.en: I'm sorry, sir, I was too busy serving...
translation.zh:
很抱歉，先生
当时我忙着服侍…

translation.en: ...to listen to the speeches.
translation.zh: 没有听到您的演讲

translation.en: We got a visitor here.
translation.zh: 我们有客人了

translation.en: Be very careful.
translation.zh: 小心

translation.en: Come here. That's a boy. Come on.
translation.zh:
过来
是一只公鸽子，过来

translation.en: Okay. Easy does it.
translation.zh: 好了，别害怕

translation.en: Come on!
translation.zh: 过来！

translation.en: I suggest we be quieter.
translation.zh: 我建议安静下来

translation.en: You don't want to startle it.
translation.zh: 你不想要吓到它

translation.en: It'll come down.
translation.zh: 它会下来的

translation.en: I think if we leave the window open....
translation.zh: 我想如果我们把窗户打开…

translation.en: Good.
translation.zh: 好的

translation.en: Very still.
translation.zh: 别动

translation.en: Go on. Out! Come on. Out!
translation.zh:
出去吧！
出去！

translation.en: Well done.
translation.zh: 干得漂亮

translation.en: Well done, sir.
translation.zh:
干得漂亮
先生
